thread.title: Woman, 36, bust for mandrax in Kimberley
thread.title_full: Woman, 36, bust for mandrax in Kimberley | News24

author: news24.com
title: Woman, 36, bust for mandrax in Kimberley
text:
Johannesburg - A 36-year-old woman was arrested in Kimberley in connection with a R6 000 stash of mandrax, police said on Thursday.
She was about to board a taxi from the diamond mining city to Hartswater when police arrested her after a tip-off.
She is expected to appear in the Kimberley Magistrate's Court on Thursday on a charge of possession of mandrax.
The drug was developed as a sedative but is known to be used recreationally, often mixed with dagga.
